@description.name: @description
@description.body: Implementations of this interface provide resources requested by Qookery

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return the URI of a named resource

This method allows applications to extend or replace default resolution performed by qx.util.ResourceManager

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} the name of the resource

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} a URI that can be used to load the resource
@return.description: a URI that can be used to load the resource

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Load a remote resource (sync or async)

Calls to this method imply synchronous loading when no success callback has been set

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} name of the wanted resource

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thisArg {Object ? null} optional context for callbacks, may be null
@param.description: optional context for callbacks, may be null

@param.name: @param
@param.body: successCallback {Function} optional function to be called on asynchronous load success
@param.description: optional function to be called on asynchronous load success

@param.name: @param
@param.body: failCallback {Function} optional function to be called on asynchronous load failure
@param.description: optional function to be called on asynchronous load failure
